data.text:
Hideki Yukawa Kanji 湯川 英樹（ゆかわ ひでき） Description Gender Male Age 18-19 Status Alive Height 180cm Professional Status Occupation University Student Club Astronomy club​ (Formerly) Personal Status Friends Satsuki Sasahara (Girlfriend) Debut Manga Chapter 5 Anime Episode 1 Voice Actors Japanese Daisuke Ono English J. Michael Tatum Image Gallery

Hideki Yukawa is a character in Tsurezure Children. He was formerly in the Astronomy Club and is dating Satsuki Sasahara.

Appearance[]

Hideki has piercing blue eyes with dark green hair.

Personality[]

Hideki is very chill and does not get affected by Sasahara's confessions of love for he only thinks it's all a joke since she covers it up by telling him that, so he plays along for now. That was until their last night of star gazing together.

History[]

Hideki played baseball in Middle School.

Relationships[]

Satsuki Sasahara:[]

Satuki is his girlfriend. He has always deeply cared for her and loved her, he just always felt like she didn't feel the same way considering she would always confess her love and then turn around and tell him it was a joke. Until episode 1 he told her to stop and tell him how she really feels about him.

Trivia[]

Hideki's hobby is cooking.

Appearances[]
